attributes.action: Reduce income tax & VAT permanently to help all those working with living costs
attributes.background: With the rate of inflation in living costs our income has not kept up. Help persuade the government to reduce taxes upon us to help with our surviving costs. Reduce income tax and value added tax on purchases that will help the hard working British public to be more comfortable in life.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what level you'd like income tax and VAT to be reduced to.

You can see the current rates of income tax here:

https://www.gov.uk/income-tax-rates

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
